channel.title: Server Speed Problems
channel.description:
Hello there, I've been trying for days to try and fix this weird glitch, sometimes the speed of everything is like x2
example:
Camera rotation Walking Running Emotes
They all go super fast and it's really weird. Does anyone have any suggestions on how to fix this bug?
Thanks.

item.title: Server Speed Problems
